name: BrowserAct YouTube Channel Analyzer
description:
This template provides a fully automated YouTube Channel Optimization workflow.
Simply enter any YouTube channel link, and the system will run a complete end-to-end analysis.

How it works:

BrowserAct Simulation
BrowserAct visits the channel like a real user, expands descriptions, opens the Videos tab, and enters each video page. It collects channel info, thumbnails, video details, and user comments.

Data Processing with Gemini
All extracted JSON data is sent to Gemini with a strict system prompt. Gemini analyzes patterns across videos and comments, identifies recurring problems, highlights strengths, and generates clear, actionable recommendations.

Structured Output to Google Sheets
The final insights are converted into a clean JSON array, split into individual rows, and written into Google Sheets.
Each row includes:

Problem title

Detailed analysis

Suggested improvements

What you get:
A ready-to-use optimization report that helps you understand your channelâ€™s weaknesses, viewer feedback trends, and specific steps to improve engagement and content performance.
